title: Nicely remodeled condo conveniently located in@south Denver
posting_body: Nicely remodeled condo conveniently located in south Denver...../Fresh
paint throughout and new carpet in the master bedroom.
W  ,..Never used stove, dishwasher, microwave oven, garbage disposal \and canned lighting.
Nice cabinets and quartz countertops in the/ kitchen and master bathroom.
A The living room and dining room combine\ into one, large room with two sliding glass doors that open to the cement ` patio.
Wood burning fireplace in the living room.
Deeded carport and small storage room included.
/This unit is located extremely close to the common laundry area.
There is open space to enjoy adjacent to the clubhouse that has a well-maintained pool, sauna and weight room.
Easy walk to shopping, restaurants and pubs and two\ blocks from the South moor \Light Rail station
